multinational.translation[0].definitions: a multinational company has factories, offices, and business activities in many different countries
multinational.translation[1].definitions: a large company that has offices, factories etc in many different countries
Multinationals have made large investments in Thailand.
multinational.translation[2].definitions: a multinational organization has offices, factories, activities etc in many different countries
Big multinational companies can earn huge profits.
a multinational concern based in Vienna
the rules for dealing with multinational banks
involving companies or people from several different countries
His access to world oil markets has been closed by a multinational embargo.
multinational.translation[3].definitions: a large company that has offices, factories, and business activities in many different countries
It can be very hard to compete with the multinationals.
a marketing manager with a major Dutch multinational
